body: So... She was madly in love with him, but he was oblivious to it, then when she hit puberty she decided to distance herself from him before he found himself a girlfriend, but it only destroyed their relationship? Plus by ignoring him all of a sudden she sent "love flags" to him which made him develop mixed feelings as a response, right?
妹妹很可愛，但不是很能理解為甚麼男主這麼抵觸，原本應該是和姦的劇情被硬生生的演成了逆姦，明明知道現在的妹妹是幽靈，為何不好好享受，雖然是HE但看著有夠彆扭

@korajon: Truck-kun (drunk driver), only she didn't got sent to isekai. She asks god for her last wish, so she's allowed to return with a body, but only in her brother's room. At first, they're not even sure if she will go away if her wish is fulfilled. Actually she loved her brother, but even her friend look at her weirdly so she tried avoiding her brother. She's even glad she died, because now she came back and they actually got closer again and could have sex.
